sendBox.textTooLong: Your message length is over the maximum limit.

cameraButton.onSplitButtonAriaLabel: Turn off camera and camera options
cameraButton.offSplitButtonAriaLabel: Turn on camera and camera options
cameraButton.cameraActionTurnedOnAnnouncement: Your camera has been turned on
cameraButton.cameraActionTurnedOffAnnouncement: Your camera has been turned off

microphoneButton.microphoneActionTurnedOnAnnouncement: Your microphone has been turned on
microphoneButton.microphoneActionTurnedOffAnnouncement: Your microphone has been turned off

messageThread.editBoxTextLimit: Your message is over the limit of {limitNumber} characters

errorBar.accessDenied: Unable to access chat services - please check the user credentials provided
errorBar.userNotInChatThread: You are no longer in this chat thread
errorBar.sendMessageNotInChatThread: Failed to send message because you are no longer in this chat thread
errorBar.callingNetworkFailure: Troubling connecting call - you seem to be offline
errorBar.callNoSpeakerFound: No speakers or headphones found. Connect an audio device to hear the call.
errorBar.callNoMicrophoneFound: No microphones found. Connect an audio input device.
errorBar.callMicrophoneAccessDenied: Unable to access microphone. Click the lock in the address bar to grant permission to this webpage.
errorBar.callMicrophoneAccessDeniedSafari: Unable to access microphone. Refresh the page to allow permissions, or check this browser’s settings and verify permissions are enabled for this website.
errorBar.callMicrophoneMutedBySystem: You are muted by your system.
errorBar.callMicrophoneUnmutedBySystem: Your microphone recovered and you were unmuted by your system.
errorBar.callMacOsMicrophoneAccessDenied: Unable to access microphone. Grant microphone permission in your macOS privacy settings.
errorBar.callLocalVideoFreeze: Network bandwidth is poor. Your video may appear paused for others on the call.
errorBar.callCameraAccessDenied: Unable to access camera. Click the lock in the address bar to grant permission to this webpage.
errorBar.callCameraAccessDeniedSafari: Unable to access camera. Refresh the page to allow permissions, or check this browser’s settings and verify permissions are enabled for this website.
errorBar.callCameraAlreadyInUse: Unable to access camera. It may already be in use by another application.
errorBar.callVideoStoppedBySystem: Your video has been stopped by your system.
errorBar.callMacOsCameraAccessDenied: MacOS is blocking access to your camera. Update your privacy settings to allow this browser to access your camera.
errorBar.callMacOsScreenShareAccessDenied: MacOS is blocking screen sharing. Update your privacy settings to allow this browser to record your screen.
errorBar.failedToJoinCallInvalidMeetingLink: Unable to join Meeting. Invalid Link.
errorBar.startScreenSharingGeneric: There was an issue starting screen share.

UnsupportedBrowser.secondaryText: Please join this call using a compatible browser.

UnsupportedBrowserVersion.secondaryText: To ensure the best call possible, please update your browser and then try joining the call again.

UnsupportedOperatingSystem.secondaryText: Please join this call using a device with a compatible operating system.

BrowserPermissionDenied.primaryText: Can't use your camera or microphone
BrowserPermissionDenied.secondaryText: Your browser might not have access to your camera or microphone. To fix this, open System Preferences.

BrowserPermissionDeniedIOS.secondaryText: So other participants can hear you.
